name: CoolCool - PDF Reader, Viewer 2020
description: Do you want to read pdf ebook on your phone or android tablet easily? So Pdf Reader, Viewer 2020 will meet all your needs.   This is a Pdf Reader which is completely free and reliable for your android phone. This application have a simple interface and makes it easy to read pdf or manage file on your phone. This is the best, simple and easy to use Pdf reader.   Features:   Pdf Reader for pdf file download from email, web,...  Open pdf reader file bookmark so you can navigate to every outline quickly   Remember your last page for pdf reader.  Arrange the PDF in your phone with PDF file cover picture  Auto reload PDF files list when there is change.
